subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: With Jason Kidd out because of a strained lower back, the San Antonio Spurs, using a 20-0 run in the second quarter, crushed the Nets at Continental Arena Tuesday night.
snippet: With Jason Kidd out because of a strained lower back, the San Antonio Spurs, using a 20-0 run in the second quarter, crushed the Nets at Continental Arena Tuesday night.
